SARS-CoV-2 variants

Open-source tracking for emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants that pose a risk based on COVID-19 vaccine genetics.

Reference genome sequence

The refernece data was sourced from:

  • Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 isolate Wuhan-Hu-1, complete genome
  • NCBI Reference Sequence: NC_045512.2
  • via https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/NC_045512

The amino acid sequence of the coding region was used for multiple sequence alignment, as shown in file: variants_of_concern_to_vaccine.fa

Source data

Showing 3.82kb region from base 21563 to 25384.
